text: The Tülü is a hybrid of a male Bactrian camel and a female dromedary. This breed is special for camel wrestling in Turkey and Kazakhstan.https://www.researchgate.net/figure/A-Turkish-F1-hybrid-tuelue- showing-the-typically-elongated-hump-named-almond-hump-in_fig4_340244750 ==References== Category:Camelids
title: Hybrid camel
